## Source: ossf-package-analysis (3fe6252a604b17dd1a1799bfeba0cb441660262a4c948a4fde2ed4b868d68b2f)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'github-datasource' @ 99.99.99 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
